description:
Non-material amendments to planning permission ref 2022/2359/P dated 20/12/22 (for demolition of existing buildings and structures except Lulworth House and Agar Children's Centre (residential units and retail units) and erection of new buildings along with the refurbishment and extension of Lulworth House to provide residential units; a community facility; retail units, business space, non-residential institution) 
comprising changes to external elevations including materials and fenestration changes, roof plant enclosure increased on Block B1 and changes to roof access, disabled parking bays and long stay cycle parking spaces re-positioned, changes to soft and hard landscaping, and minor adjustments to street furniture and play equipment locations
